sqlMap.sql: SELECT A.BIN_ProductID AS bin_ProductID, A.UnitCode AS unitCode, A.NameTotal AS nameTotal, A.NameForeign AS nameForeign, B.SalePrice AS salePrice FROM Basis.BIN_Product A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductPrice B ON A.BIN_ProductID = B.BIN_ProductID AND B.Type = '2' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT distinct A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID, A.GroupCode, A.GroupName, A.ActivityType, A.ActivityBeginDate, A.ActivityEndDate, A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID AS prmActGrpID, case when B.BIN_PromotionActivityID is null then 1 else 0 end as delFlag FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActGrp A LEFT JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity B ON( A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID = B.BIN_PromotionActGrpID ) WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoID,
A.BrandNameForeign AS brandName
A.BrandNameChinese AS brandName
A.BrandNameChinese AS brandName
FROM Basis.BIN_BrandInfo A WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
SELECT A.BrandCode AS brandCode FROM Basis.BIN_BrandInfo A WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BIN_RegionID AS cityId,
A.RegionNameForeign AS cityName,
A.RegionNameChinese AS cityName,
A.RegionNameChinese AS cityName,
B.BIN_RegionID AS provinceId,
B.RegionNameForeign AS provinceName,
B.RegionNameChinese AS provinceName,
B.RegionNameChinese AS provinceName,
C.BIN_RegionID AS regionId
,C.RegionNameForeign AS regionName
,C.RegionNameChinese AS regionName
,C.RegionNameChinese AS regionName
,D.CounterCode AS counterCode ,oz.DepartName AS counterName
,null AS counterCode ,null AS counterName
FROM Basis.BIN_Region A, Basis.BIN_Region B, Basis.BIN_Region C, Basis.BIN_Region AD
JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo D ON(D.BIN_RegionID = AD.BIN_RegionID) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON(D.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN(
)dp ON(dp.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID)
,Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition pr ,Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity pa ,Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule par
WHERE C.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
C.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND
pr.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_city# AND pr.BasePropValue1 = convert(NVARCHAR,A.BIN_RegionID) AND
par.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = #promotionActivityRuleID# AND
pr.ValidFlag = '1' AND
pr.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_counter# AND pr.BasePropValue1 = convert(NVARCHAR,D.CounterCode) AND
par.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = #promotionActivityRuleID# AND
pr.ValidFlag = '1' AND
pa.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND pa.BIN_PromotionActivityID = par.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND par.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = pr.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND pr.ConditionGrpID = #grpID# AND
D.ValidFlag='1' AND oz.ValidFlag='1' AND
C.RegionType = '0' AND A.NodeID.GetAncestor(1) = B.NodeID AND B.NodeID.GetAncestor(1) = C.NodeID AND AD.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(A.NodeID)=1 AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND C.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT ci.CounterCode AS counterCode,
ct.BIN_RegionID AS cityID,
ci.BIN_RegionID AS cityID,
ci.BIN_ChannelID AS channelID, ci.BelongFaction AS factionID,
oz.NameForeign AS counterName
oz.DepartName AS counterName
oz.DepartName AS counterName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON(ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
)dp ON(dp.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID)
,Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition pr ,Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity pa ,Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule par
,Basis.BIN_Region ct ,Basis.BIN_Region ctd
WHERE ci.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
ct.BIN_RegionID = #cityID# AND ctd.BIN_RegionID = ci.BIN_RegionID AND ctd.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(ct.NodeID)=1 AND ctd.ValidFlag = '1' AND ct.ValidFlag = '1' AND
ci.BIN_ChannelID = #channelID# AND
ci.BelongFaction = #factionID# AND
pr.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_counter# AND pr.BasePropValue1 = convert(NVARCHAR,ci.CounterCode) AND pa.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND pa.BIN_PromotionActivityID = par.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND par.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = pr.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND pr.ConditionGrpID = #grpID# AND
par.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = #promotionActivityRuleID# AND
pr.ValidFlag = '1' AND
ci.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND
ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BelongFaction AS id, A.CounterCode AS counterCode, A.CounterNameIF AS counterName FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A JOIN (
)B ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition C ON(A.CounterCode = C.BasePropValue1 AND C.ActLocationType = '8') JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule D on(C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = D.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID) WHERE D.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND A.BelongFaction IS NOT NULL AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BelongFaction AS id, A.CounterCode AS counterCode, A.CounterNameIF AS counterName FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A JOIN (
)B ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BelongFaction IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 from Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition C JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule D on(C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = D.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID) where A.CounterCode = C.BasePropValue1 AND C.ActLocationType = '8' AND D.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# )

SELECT bc.BIN_ChannelID AS id
,bc.ChannelNameForeign AS name
,bc.ChannelName AS name
,bc.ChannelName AS name
,ci.CounterCode AS counterCode ,oz.DepartName AS counterName
,null AS counterCode ,null AS counterName
FROM Basis.BIN_Channel bc
JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci ON(bc.BIN_ChannelID = ci.BIN_ChannelID) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON(ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
)dp ON(dp.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID)
,Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition pr ,Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity pa ,Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule par
WHERE bc.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
bc.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND
pr.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_channal# AND pr.BasePropValue1 = convert(NVARCHAR,bc.BIN_ChannelID) AND
par.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = #promotionActivityRuleID# AND
pr.ValidFlag = '1' AND
pr.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = #baseProp_counter# AND pr.BasePropValue1 = convert(NVARCHAR,ci.CounterCode) AND
par.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = #promotionActivityRuleID# AND
pr.ValidFlag = '1' AND
pa.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID# AND pa.BIN_PromotionActivityID = par.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND par.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = pr.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND pr.ConditionGrpID = #grpID# AND
ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1' AND
bc.ValidFlag = '1'
